name: Dark Chocolate Chip Cookies with Greek Yogurt
author: Kelsey Gibson
summary: Light and fluffy cookies with a little zip from the Greek yogurt.
ingredients: ¾ cup packed dark brown sugar
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cream brown sugar, butter, and yogurt together in a bowl
Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition
Dissolve baking soda in hot water and add to the batter
Stir in cake flour, whole wheat flour, and salt, being careful not to overmix
Stir in dark chocolate chips, semisweet chocolate chips, and walnuts
Drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes
Cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely
